author: ts:ez.no
msg: - Implemented enhancement #14804: ezcConsoleOptionRule now has a property
"ifSet". This one defaults to true, meaning that the rule is validated if
the option it is attached to was submitted. If set to false, the rule is
validated if the option was not submitted.

author: ts:ez.no
msg: - Added new "ifSet" option to ezcConsoleOptionRule class.

author: as:ez.no
msg: - Fixed rendering of the cloud element in RSS2.
